title: Demographics
section: Targeting based on Employment or Education Instituation
text:
Targeting based on Employment or Education Instituation
The following graphs depict how parties utilize various job sectors and types of education as focus groups and the percentage of the budget allocated to them. The next graph focuses on educational levels.

Note: targeting criteria may overlap, so the total may not necessarily be 100%.

title: Spending
text:
Here you can see the expenditures of political parties in the lead-up to the elections according to the latest data.

30 Apr - 29 May 202423 May - 29 May 2024
